channel.title: Data Structure and Algorithms on Xueshan Chen
channel.description: Recent content in Data Structure and Algorithms on Xueshan Chen

item.title: Remove Element
item.description: Problem leetcode Given an integer array nums and an integer val, remove all occurrences of val in nums in-place. The relative order of the elements may be changed. Since it is impossible to change the length of the array in some languages, you must instead have the result be placed in the first part of the array nums. More formally, if there are k elements after removing the duplicates, then the first k elements of nums should hold the final result.

item.title: Binary Search
item.description: Base Definitions of Array elements in an array can’t be deleted, just can be rewrite in different program language, the memory management is different in java, the memory location is not continuing in C++, it is continuing Binary Search Leetcode link Given an array of integers nums which is sorted in ascending order, and an integer target, write a function to search target in nums.
